docs.snippet: When the steamship Brazil, the first ship of the "Good Neighbor" fleet, arrives here tomorrow, Brazilians will give her an appropriate welcome.
docs.lead_paragraph: When the steamship Brazil, the first ship of the "Good Neighbor" fleet, arrives here tomorrow, Brazilians will give her an appropriate welcome.
docs.abstract: Rio de Janeiro prepares to welcome SS Brazil; dinner for shipping men to be held on SS Uruguay

headline.main: RIO WILL WELCOME STEAMSHIP BRAZIL; First Vessel of the 'Good-Neighbor' Fleet to Be Greeted Today VARGAS WILL CO ABOARD Luncheon for President Will Be Given on Linear by U. S. Maritime Commission

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The touring United States amateur boxing team opened its South American invasion with a victory tonight as Bobby Carroll, Trenton (N. J.) flyweight, easily outpointed Guillermo Porteiro of Uruguay in the first bout of the Pan-American championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: The touring United States amateur boxing team opened its South American invasion with a victory tonight as Bobby Carroll, Trenton (N. J.) flyweight, easily outpointed Guillermo Porteiro of Uruguay in the first bout of the Pan-American championships.

headline.main: CARROLL SCORES FOR U. S.; Beats Porteiro in Amateur Title Bout at Buenos Aires

docs.snippet: Speaking amid the sumptuous surroundings of the newly reconditioned American Republics liner Uruguay, which sails tomorrow on its first voyage to South America, former Governor Alfred E. Smith recalled last night the days when he was a boy on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Speaking amid the sumptuous surroundings of the newly reconditioned American Republics liner Uruguay, which sails tomorrow on its first voyage to South America, former Governor Alfred E. Smith recalled last night the days when he was a boy on the East Side and saw the clipper ships sail into New York Harbor from South American ports.
docs.abstract: A E Smith and others s at Uruguay dinner

headline.main: SMITH, ON NEW LINER, RECALLS CLIPPER ERA; Tells of Old Days at Dinner on South American Ship

docs.snippet: Three new passenger ships for transpacific service are being designed by the United States Maritime Commission as its next step in the development of a complete American merchant marine, M. L. Wilcox, director of operations and traffic of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Three new passenger ships for transpacific service are being designed by the United States Maritime Commission as its next step in the development of a complete American merchant marine, M. L. Wilcox, director of operations and traffic of the commission, said last night at the dinner of the American Steamship and Tourist Agents Association, held in the Hotel McAlpin.

headline.main: U. S. Plans Three Big Transpacific Liners For New Era of Travel on Ships of Our Flag

docs.snippet: The Italian liner Conte di Savoia, sailing today for Mediterranean ports, will have as passengers Mrs. Charles de Rham, Sidney Chaplin, Mrs. Reginald C. Vanderbilt, Mrs. A. B. Thaw, Lady Mary Lygon, Miss Dorothy Flagg, Miss Helen Gifford and Mrs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Italian liner Conte di Savoia, sailing today for Mediterranean ports, will have as passengers Mrs. Charles de Rham, Sidney Chaplin, Mrs. Reginald C. Vanderbilt, Mrs. A. B. Thaw, Lady Mary Lygon, Miss Dorothy Flagg, Miss Helen Gifford and Mrs. Augusto Rosso.

docs.snippet: President Getulio Vargas will open the Philatelic Exposition here tomorrow. Twenty-nine countries will be represented. There will be 230 exhibitors, including President Roosevelt and Prince Dom Pedro d'Orleans, pretender to the extinct Brazilian...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Getulio Vargas will open the Philatelic Exposition here tomorrow. Twenty-nine countries will be represented. There will be 230 exhibitors, including President Roosevelt and Prince Dom Pedro d'Orleans, pretender to the extinct Brazilian imperial throne.
